data.message:
Dear Facebook, 

With horror I found out that the following pages were removed from Facebook. 

كلنا خالد سعيد

http://facebook.com/ElShaheeed 

and 

Mohamed ElBaradei - 

محمد البرادعيhttp://facebook.com/Elbarad3i 

Both
the timing and the political orientation of the two pages make the
removal very suspicious. Each of these pages had over 300,000 fans,
were the most active groups in Egypt, and were the only two outlets for
Egyptian users to discuss issues of interest to them in a country with
one of the worst human rights records. 

I demand Facebook
administration bring back both pages and respect the wishes of myself
and the over half a million of my fellow Egyptians, and bring back both
pages immediately. It would be very difficult for me to accept such
collaboration with the censorship policies with the Egyptian regime,
and it will be very difficult for me to reward Facebook with continuing
to use it. I will definitely be very responsive to calls of boycotting
Facebook if the pages were not brought back, as I will not have good
reasons to use Facebook anymore. 

Please respond to my demand as soon as possible. 

Sincerely,
ٍٍ
Shady Mohammed
